originalTitle: US YouTube star IShowSpeed to get Ghanaian passport as Africa tour ends
title: Speedy News: Famous Internet Star Might Get Ghana Passport!
content:
Hello, Super Reporters!

Hi everyone! It's your friendly news reporter for Africa here, ready with some super exciting news from Ghana! We're talking about a very famous person called IShowSpeed. He's a big star on the internet, especially on YouTube. Guess what? He just finished a fun trip all around Africa. And something special happened in Ghana! Ghana's big boss, the Foreign Minister, said something amazing. He said IShowSpeed might get a special Ghanaian passport!

Who is IShowSpeed?

So, who is IShowSpeed? He is a young man from America. He is super popular on YouTube, a website where people watch videos. He loves to play video games and make funny videos. Lots and lots of people watch his videos every single day! He has millions of fans from all over the world, even right here in Africa. He makes people laugh and smile. People who make popular videos like him are sometimes called 'influencers'. This means they can make people interested in new things! Did you know? YouTube is a place where you can watch videos about almost anything you can think of! From cartoons to learning how to draw.

What is a Passport?

Now, let's talk about a passport. What is it? A passport is a very important little book. It has your picture and tells everyone which country you belong to. When you want to travel to another country, you need your passport. It's like your special ticket to fly around the world! Most people can only have a passport from the country where they were born, or where their family comes from. So, for IShowSpeed to get a Ghanaian passport is a very big deal! It means Ghana wants him to be a part of their family. Did you know? Passports have a special chip inside them, like a tiny computer, to keep your information safe!

Why Would Ghana Give Him a Passport?

Ghana's big boss, the Foreign Minister, thinks IShowSpeed is very special. He called him a 'worthy ambassador'. An ambassador is like a special helper for a country. They travel and tell everyone how great their country is. The Minister thinks that because IShowSpeed is so famous, he can help more people know about Ghana. He can show them how wonderful Ghana is! When IShowSpeed makes videos about Ghana, lots of his fans will see it. This can make them want to visit Ghana too! More visitors mean more friends for Ghana and maybe even new businesses. It's like having a very famous friend tell everyone how cool your playground is!

Speedy's African Adventure!

IShowSpeed didn't just visit Ghana. He went on a big 'Africa tour'! This means he traveled to many different countries in Africa. He visited places like Kenya, South Africa, and Ghana. He met lots of his fans in these countries. He even learned some new dances and tried new foods! His fans were super happy to see him. They cheered and shouted his name! It was a great way for him to learn about Africa and for Africa to learn about him. He shared his journey with all his online friends. Did you know? Africa is a huge continent with 54 different countries! Each one has its own special culture and beautiful places.

Not Everyone Agreed

Now, not everyone in Ghana was super happy about the idea of IShowSpeed getting a passport. Some people in Ghana felt that passports should only be given to people who are born in Ghana, or who have lived there for a very long time. They thought it might not be fair to give a special passport to someone from another country just because they are famous. It's like when you have a special toy, and you want to share it, but some friends think you should only share it with your family. But the Foreign Minister still thinks it's a good idea for Ghana.

What Happens Next?

So, what will happen next? Will IShowSpeed really get his Ghanaian passport? We will have to wait and see! It's a big decision for a country to make. If he does get it, it means he can come and go from Ghana very easily. He can visit his friends there whenever he wants! He could even make more exciting videos right from Ghana, showing everyone its beautiful sights and sounds. Did you know? Ghana is famous for its delicious jollof rice and beautiful kente cloth!

Why This is Big News!

This news shows how famous people on the internet can connect different parts of the world. It shows that even though people live far apart, they can share fun times and learn from each other. It's a story about new friends, special papers, and showing the world how amazing Africa is! We'll keep you updated on what happens next with IShowSpeed and his special Ghana passport!
summary: Famous US internet star IShowSpeed might get a special Ghanaian passport because Ghana's Foreign Minister thinks he can help share good things about Ghana with the world, even though some people in Ghana are not sure about it.
whyMatters: This is important because it shows how famous internet stars can help countries connect and share their culture with many people, and it's a big decision for a country to give a passport to someone famous from far away.

originalTitle: The model who moved to Ghana and wrapped her prosthetic leg in its famous fabric
title: The model who moved to Ghana and wrapped her prosthetic leg in its famous fabric
content: Abena Christine Jon'el left the US and now aims to raise the profile of people with disabilities in Ghana.

content: To find Ran Gvili, Israel desecrated hundreds of Palestinian graves and the world did not care.

title: Stranraer expelled as they miss Rangers cup pay day

originalTitle: Stabbed Chelsea fan shocked by Naples attack
title: Stabbed Chelsea fan shocked by Naples attack
content: A Chelsea supporter describes his "shock" after being stabbed and taken to hospital in Naples before the Champions League match against Napoli in Italy.
